mapper.insert: insert into log (create_time, credit_id, group_id, use_time,invoke_time, cost, user_id,interface_id) values (#{createTime}, #{creditId}, #{groupId}, #{useTime},#{invokeTime}, #{cost}, #{userId},#{interfaceId})
insert into user_interface (user_id, interface_id, invoke_count) values (#{userId},#{interfaceId},1)
mapper.update: insert into log_details( log_id,request_params, response) values (#{logId},#{requestParams},#{response})
mapper.select: select COUNT(*) from interface_info where is_delete = 0
select inf.id,inf.name,sum(ui.invoke_count) as invokeCount from user_interface ui left join interface_info inf on inf.id=ui.interface_id group by ui.interface_id limit 0,3
